verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei words דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David הָאַֽחֲרֹנִ֑ים <S%H314><s%> ha-'a-cha-ro-Nim; Now these [be] the last נְאֻ֧ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um said דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יִשַׁ֗י <S%H3448><s%> yi-Shai, of Jesse וּנְאֻ֤ם <S%H5002><s%> u-ne-'Um said הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <S%H1397><s%> hag-Ge-ver and the man הֻ֣קַם <S%H6965><s%> Hu-kam [who was] raised up עָ֔ל <S%H5920><s%> 'Al, on high מְשִׁ֙יחַ֙ <S%H4899><s%> me-Shi-ach the anointed אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob וּנְעִ֖ים <S%H5273><s%> u-ne-'Im and the sweet זְמִר֥וֹת <S%H2158><s%> ze-mi-Rot psalmist יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach The Spirit יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> dib-ber- spake בִּ֑י Bi; וּמִלָּת֖וֹ <S%H4405><s%> u-mil-la-To by me and his word עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- was on לְשׁוֹנִֽי׃ <S%H3956><s%> le-sho-Ni. [was] in my tongue

אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei The God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לִ֥י li דִבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> dib-Ber spake צ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> tzur the Rock יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel to me He that ruleth בָּאָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> ba-'a-Dam, over men צַדִּ֕יק <S%H6662><s%> tzad-Dik [must be] just מוֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> mo-Shel ruling יִרְאַ֥ת <S%H3374><s%> yir-'At in the fear אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. of God

וּכְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> u-che-'or And [he shall be] as the light בֹּ֖קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker of the morning יִזְרַח־ <S%H2224><s%> yiz-rach- riseth שָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> Sha-mesh; [when] the sun בֹּ֚קֶר <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker [even] a morning לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo without עָב֔וֹת <S%H5645><s%> a-Vot, clouds מִנֹּ֥גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> min-No-gah by clear shining מִמָּטָ֖ר <S%H4306><s%> mi-ma-Tar after rain דֶּ֥שֶׁא <S%H1877><s%> De-she [as] the tender grass מֵאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> me-'A-retz. [springing] out of the earth

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Truly לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not כֵ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> chen so בֵּיתִ֖י <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti Although my house עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with אֵ֑ל <S%H410><s%> 'El; [be] not so with God כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki indeed בְרִ֨ית <S%H1285><s%> ve-Rit covenant עוֹלָ֜ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam with me an everlasting שָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> sam yet he hath made לִ֗י Li, עֲרוּכָ֤ה <S%H6186><s%> 'a-ru-Chah ordered בַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> vak-Kol all וּשְׁמֻרָ֔ה <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mu-Rah, in all [things] and sure כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- indeed כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol things יִשְׁעִ֥י <S%H3468><s%> yish-'I for [this is] all my salvation וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol for all חֵ֖פֶץ <S%H2656><s%> Che-fetz and all [my] desire כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- indeed לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo make not יַצְמִֽיחַ׃ <S%H6779><s%> yatz-Mi-ach. although he make [it] not to grow

וּבְלִיַּ֕עַל <S%H1100><s%> u-ve-li-Ya-'al But [the sons] of Belial כְּק֥וֹץ <S%H6975><s%> ke-Kotz [shall be] all of them as thorns מֻנָ֖ד <S%H5074><s%> mu-Nad thrust away כֻּלָּ֑הַם <S%H3605><s%> kul-La-ham; every כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo cannot בְיָ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> ve-Yad with hands יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> yik-Ka-chu. because they cannot be taken

וְאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish But the man יִגַּ֣ע <S%H5060><s%> yig-Ga' [that] shall touch בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, יִמָּלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> yim-ma-Le them must be fenced בַרְזֶ֖ל <S%H1270><s%> var-Zel with iron וְעֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> ve-'Etz and the staff חֲנִ֑ית <S%H2595><s%> cha-Nit; of a spear וּבָאֵ֕שׁ <S%H784><s%> u-va-'Esh with fire שָׂר֥וֹף <S%H8313><s%> sa-Rof and they shall be utterly יִשָּׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> yis-sa-re-Fu burned בַּשָּֽׁבֶת׃ <S%H7675><s%> bash-Sha-vet. in the [same] place פ Peh

אֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These שְׁמ֥וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot These [be] the names הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom לְדָוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid; whom David יֹשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev that sat בַּשֶּׁ֜בֶת <S%H7675><s%> bash-She-vet place תַּחְכְּמֹנִ֣י׀ <S%H8461><s%> tach-ke-mo-Ni had The Tachmonite רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh chief הַשָּׁלִשִׁ֗י <S%H7991><s%> hash-sha-li-Shi, among the captains ה֚וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he עֲדִינ֣וֹ <S%H5722><s%> a-di-No the same [was] Adino; הָעֶצְנֹו ha-'etz-no כהָֽעֶצְנִ֔י <S%H6112><s%> ha-'etz-Ni, Eznite קעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because שְׁמֹנֶ֥ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh [he lift up his spear] against eight מֵא֛וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred חָלָ֖ל <S%H2491><s%> cha-Lal whom he slew בְּפַ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> be-Fa-'am time; אֶחָד 'e-chad כאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chat. a קס sa-Mek

וְאַחֲרֹו ve-'a-cha-ro כוְאַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav after that קאֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son; דֹּדִי do-di כדֹּדֹ֖ו <S%H1734><s%> do-Do Dodo קבֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחֹחִ֑י <S%H266><s%> 'a-cho-Chi; the Ahohite בִּשְׁלֹשָׁ֨ה <S%H7969><s%> bish-lo-Shah [one] of the three; גִּבֹּרִים gib-bo-rim כהַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim champion קעִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, with David בְּחָֽרְפָ֤ם <S%H2778><s%> be-cha-re-Fam when they defied בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּים <S%H6430><s%> bap-pe-lish-tim the Philistines נֶאֶסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> ne-'es-fu- [that] were there gathered together שָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> lam-mil-cha-Mah, to battle וַֽיַּעֲל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> vai-ya-'a-Lu were gone away אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish and the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He קָם֩ <S%H6965><s%> kam He arose וַיַּ֨ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach and smote בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> bap-pe-lish-Tim the Philistines עַ֣ד׀ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- until יָגְעָ֣ה <S%H3021><s%> ya-ge-'Ah was weary יָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do, his hand וַתִּדְבַּ֤ק <S%H1692><s%> vat-tid-Bak clave יָדוֹ֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do and his hand אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַחֶ֔רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ha-Che-rev, unto the sword וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as wrought יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'Ah victory גְדוֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah a great בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu; he וְהָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people יָשֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> ya-Shu-vu returned אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav after אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> 'ach- only לְפַשֵּֽׁט׃ <S%H6584><s%> le-fash-Shet. him only to spoil ס sa-Mek

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav And after שַׁמָּ֥א <S%H8037><s%> sham-Ma Shamma בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אָגֵ֖א <S%H89><s%> 'a-Ge of Agee הָרָרִ֑י <S%H2043><s%> ha-ra-Ri; the Hararite וַיֵּאָסְפ֨וּ <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'a-se-Fu were gathered together פְלִשְׁתִּ֜ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim And the Philistines לַחַיָּ֗ה <S%H2416><s%> la-chai-Yah, into a troop וַתְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-hi- become שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> sham where חֶלְקַ֤ת <S%H2513><s%> chel-Kat where was a piece הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <S%H4395><s%> me-le-'Ah fruit עֲדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H5742><s%> 'a-da-Shim, of lentiles וְהָעָ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> ve-ha-'Am and the people נָ֖ס <S%H5127><s%> nas fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim. the Philistines

וַיִּתְיַצֵּ֤ב <S%H3320><s%> vai-yit-yatz-Tzev But he stood בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch- in the midst הַֽחֶלְקָה֙ <S%H2513><s%> ha-chel-Kah of the ground וַיַּצִּילֶ֔הָ <S%H5337><s%> vai-yatz-tzi-Le-ha, and defended וַיַּ֖ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach it and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; the Philistines וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as wrought יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <S%H8668><s%> te-shu-'Ah victory גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah. a great ס sa-Mek

וַיֵּרְד֨וּ <S%H3381><s%> vai-ye-re-Du went down; שְׁלֹשִׁים she-lo-shim כשְׁלֹשָׁ֜ה <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shah of the thirty קמֵהַשְּׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H7970><s%> me-hash-she-lo-Shim of the thirty רֹ֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> Rosh, chief וַיָּבֹ֤אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in קָצִיר֙ <S%H7105><s%> ka-Tzir in the harvest time אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, to David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְעָרַ֖ת <S%H4631><s%> me-'a-Rat unto the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <S%H5725><s%> 'a-dul-Lam; of Adullam וְחַיַּ֣ת <S%H2416><s%> ve-chai-Yat and the troop פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <S%H2583><s%> cho-Nah pitched בְּעֵ֥מֶק <S%H6010><s%> be-'E-mek in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <S%H7497><s%> re-fa-'Im. of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid And David אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <S%H4686><s%> bam-me-tzu-Dah; [was] then in an hold וּמַצַּ֣ב <S%H4673><s%> u-matz-Tzav and the garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> 'az was then בֵּ֥ית beit לָֽחֶם׃ <S%H1035><s%> La-chem. [was] then [in] Bethlehem

וַיִּתְאַוֶּ֥ה <S%H183><s%> vai-yit-'av-Veh longed דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar; and said מִ֚י <S%H4310><s%> mi Oh יַשְׁקֵ֣נִי <S%H8248><s%> yash-Ke-ni Oh that one would give me drink מַ֔יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, of the water מִבֹּ֥אר <S%H877><s%> mib-Bor the well בֵּֽית־ beit- לֶ֖חֶם <S%H1035><s%> Le-chem of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <S%H8179><s%> bash-Sha-'ar. which [is] by the gate

וַיִּבְקְעוּ֩ <S%H1234><s%> vai-yiv-ke-'U brake through שְׁלֹ֨שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet And the three הַגִּבֹּרִ֜ים <S%H1368><s%> hag-gib-bo-Rim mighty men בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <S%H4264><s%> be-ma-cha-Neh the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> fe-lish-Tim, of the Philistines וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <S%H7579><s%> vai-yish-'a-vu- and drew מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> ma-yim water מִבֹּ֤אר <S%H877><s%> mib-Bor the well בֵּֽית־ beit- לֶ֙חֶם֙ <S%H1035><s%> le-chem of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> bash-Sha-'ar, that [was] by the gate וַיִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-'U and took וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u [it] and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; [it] to David וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אָבָה֙ <S%H14><s%> 'a-Vah nevertheless he would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֔ם <S%H8354><s%> lish-to-Tam, not drink וַיַּסֵּ֥ךְ <S%H5258><s%> vai-yas-Sech thereof but poured it out אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. unto the LORD
